audioText: Cette soirée virée en catastrophe nous a tous marqués profondément.
question: What effect did this evening have on everyone?
options: This evening that turned into a disaster marked everyone deeply
This pleasant evening created wonderful memories for all
This boring evening was quickly forgotten by everyone
This successful evening exceeded all expectations
explanation: The text states 'Cette soirée virée en catastrophe nous a tous marqués profondément' - This evening that turned into a disaster marked us all deeply. The past participle 'virée' (turned) describes a dramatic change of events.
